columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a safe deposit box.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Unique code of the safe deposit box (what customer sees on the safe deposit box label).

columns.name: width
columns.description: Width of the safe deposit box.

columns.name: height
columns.description: Height of the safe deposit box.

columns.name: depth
columns.description: Depth of the safe deposit box.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: ID of the bank account that the safe deposit box belongs to.

columns.name: vault_id
columns.description: ID of the vault where the safe deposit box is located.
